existing_features.title: Create a Japanese/anime-inspired visual theme with vibrant colors, stylized UI elements, and anime aesthetic throughout the application
Implement a character roster system with exactly 20 unique playable characters, each with distinct visual appearance
Create a background story system where each of the 20 characters has their own unique narrative that can be viewed once unlocked
Implement a character unlock system where characters start locked and become available through gameplay progression
Create a riddle/puzzle challenge system where solving riddles unlocks specific characters
Implement user authentication using Internet Identity so player progress is saved and persistent across sessions
Create a main game interface showing the character collection, progress indicators, and available challenges

Create a comprehensive tutorial/onboarding system that explains game mechanics including: how to unlock characters, how riddle challenges work, how to view character stories, and how progress tracking functions

Redesign the UI with enhanced Japanese/Korean game aesthetic featuring: polished anime-style visual effects, refined typography with better hierarchy, modern gradient schemes common in Asian mobile games, and professional-grade spacing and composition while maintaining English language for all text
Add visual indicators and tooltips throughout the interface to guide users on interactive elements, available actions, and game progression paths

Enhance the character cards with more polished anime-style visual effects including particle effects, glow animations, premium card borders, and dynamic hover states that match Japanese/Korean game quality standards
Improve the home page layout with a more engaging hero section, better visual hierarchy, and clearer calls-to-action that guide new users through their first interactions
